articles.title: LA Expands Eligibility At Vaccination Sites Starting Monday - CBS Los Angeles
articles.description: Also newly-eligible to get vaccinated are childcare workers, law enforcement personnel and emergency services workers.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) — Teachers and food and agriculture workers will be among an estimated 1.2 million Los Angeles County residents now eligible to receive the COVID-19 vaccine beginning Monday.
